page.title: 05THE SCHOOL
page.content: The school was built in 1863 .There are 258 children in the school.Type of work we do: Maths,English,Art,Poetry,Reading, Spellings,Handwriting, Science, Geography, Writing, Computer. We think school is good because the teachers are nice,the books and work is good. The selection of Art is drawing,painting,sewing and making masks. We do plays and talks on things we like. We do games and in Drama we make up plays. As you can see we are doing a project on the computer. We have a big playing field and a play ground. The hours of school are from 8.50 to 3.20 pm.Clubs 3.20, too 4.20, or 4.30.
